text:
By far the best water bottles an adventurer, traveller, climber, cyclist, hiker or even city dweller can have! Super durable, hardy, good size and most critical is the 1 hand manuveur where you can open the water bottle with just 1 hand,  such a critical and useful feature for action sports.
I have travelled with mine for 4 years and it has survived 15 countries and got thru every terrain, temperature and knock. Took 4 years before I had to have them replaced.
Best bottles ever!

Bought son’s school camp goods from Adventure World and needed urgent collection. The lady in charge helped me to expedite the fulfilment for next day collection. She was careful to check with me to make sure I got the correct pants size, which I actually got it wrong. She changed the right size for me on the spot. Really appreciate her help.

It’s a one stop station to equip one for camping event. The staff is experienced, helpful and honest. Location is walking distance to ubi mrt. Quality product and pricing is reasonable. I will be back again. Thank you.

Had purchased the camping stuffs and were promptly delivered to school. However, due to unforeseen circumstances, we had to return the items. Return and refund were done swiftly with minimal questions. Very understanding and professional owners.

Very nice, friendly and helpful elderly couple who runs the shop. They have everything you need for camp or outdoor activities and would recommend what is essential for a school camp and what's not. Prices are also cheaper and quality is assured. Very happy to chance upon this gem.
